original_title: I Dream of Jo 3: Desire and Deception
overview: It's not only Jo who is dripping with desire in the third film taken from her highly successful web site. Her girlfriend, Cipriana, gets two delicious helpings of Jo, while Sandra Rodriguez, Eve Angel and Canadian star, Alyssa Reece, all play their part in the ongoing deceptions.
title: I Dream of Jo 3: Desire and Deception
